name: DUNGEON ARCHER (FALLENBLOOD)
description:
ENDLESS DUNGEON SURVIVAL GAME MADE FOR  #juicejam  IN  8 DAYS!!

KILLS THOSE MONSTERS WITH BOW AND ARROW WITH SOME EXTRA JUICE!!

CONTROLS:
  • W,A,S,D -
  • LEFT MOUSE BUTTON (CLICK) -  SHOOTING ARROWS
  • LEFT MOUSE BUTTON (HOLD & RELEASE) - SHOOT CHARGE ARROWS
  • SPACE  - DASH/DODGE 

PROGRAMMED AND DEVELOPED BY FALLENBLOOD !

SOFTWARE USED:-
  • Unity (Game Engine)
  • Visual Studio 2019
  • Paint.net
  • Bfxr
CREDITS:-

SPECIAL THANKS TO:-

  •   0x72 for his OP Dungeon Tileset  
  • Tiny Worlds for his Awesome Fonts 
  • Willibab for his Cool Music
NOTE :- I recommend you to download the game because there is some sort of juice missing in unity web build ! To enjoy the game juice/feel please download the game!
